title: Dreader
description: A retro mouse maze horror game with a distinctive old-school 3D feel. Navigate through eerie mazes while avoiding terrifying creatures that hunt you down. Features a unique aesthetic inspired by early 3D games with modern horror elements and atmospheric sound design.
how_to_play: Use your mouse to navigate through the maze - the game follows your cursor movement. Move carefully and quietly to avoid attracting the attention of the creatures hunting you. Find the exit in each level while managing your limited resources and maintaining your sanity in the face of horror.
